name: 2D Game (azpak)
description:
2D Game, first attempt at a 2d game

Goal: collect magical objects along the way to open the path

This was part of a school project I did myself. The programming, UI, effects and storyline have all been done by me. 

Controls

Move: ASWD or Arrow keys.
Inventory: Press I to open inventory.
Accept: Press Y.
Decline: Press N.
